Music

Albums | EPs | Singles | Boxsets | Remixes | Guest Appearances | Mixes

ALBUMS
Gorillaz

Release date: 26th March 2001

Formats: Enhanced CD / 12″ Vinyl / Cassette

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/GorillazAlbum

The band’s debut studio album. All CD copies include a (now-defunct) digital key to access exclusive content via the band’s website.

Tracklist:

Re-Hash
5/4
Tomorrow Comes Today
New Genious (Brother)
Clint Eastwood [with Del]
Man Research (Clapper)
Punk
Sound Check (Gravity)
Double Bass
Rock the House [with Del]
19-2000
Latin Simone (Que Pasa Contigo) [with Ibrahim Ferrer]
Starshine
Slow Country
M1 A1 / Clint Eastwood (Ed Case/Sweetie Irie Refix)
G Sides

Release date: 12th December 2001

Formats: Enhanced CD / 12″ Vinyl

The band’s first compilation album, collecting various B-sides from Phase 1. It was initially exclusive to Japan, as Gorillaz had been a commercial failure over there.

Tracklist:

Audio –
19-2000 (Soulchild Remix)
Dracula
Rock the House (Radio Edit) [with Del]
The Sounder (Edit) [with Phi Life Cypher]*
Faust
Clint Eastwood (Phi Life Cypher Version)
Ghost Train
Hip Albatross
Left Hand Suzuki Method
12D3
Video –
Clint Eastwood (Video)
Rock the House (Video)

*The full version was only released on a bonus disc with Gorillaz in France.

Laika Come Home [versus Spacemonkeyz]

Release date: 1st July 2002

Formats: Enhanced CD / CD / 12″ Vinyl

A remix album of tracks from Gorillaz.

Tracklist:

Jungle Fresh
Strictly Rubbadub
Bañana Baby
Monkey Racket
De-Punked
P.45
Dub Ø9
Crooked Dub
Mutant Genius
Come Again
A Fistful of Peanuts
Lil’ Dub Chefin’ / Strictly Rubbadub (Extended)
Live at the Forum, 2001

Release date: 10th December 2021

Formats: 12″ Vinyl

The second live album, released as part of Gorillaz: 20th Anniversary Super Deluxe Vinyl Boxset.

Tracklist:

Side A –
M1 A1 (Live)
Tomorrow Comes Today (Live)
Slow Country (Live)
5/4 (Live)
Side B –
Starshine (Live)
Man Research (Live)
Sound Check (Live)
Re-Hash (Live)
Side C –
Clint Eastwood (Live)
Rock the House (Live)
Dracula (Live)
19-2000 (Live)
Side D –
Punk (Live)
5/4 (Reprise – Live)
Clint Eastwood (Reprise – Live)
EPs
Tomorrow Comes Today

Release date: 27th November 2000

Formats: Enhanced CD / 12″ Vinyl

The band’s debut EP; notably their first ever release.

Tracklist:

Audio –
Tomorrow Comes Today
Rock the House [with Del]
Latin Simone
12D3
Video –
Tomorrow Comes Today (Video)
Demoz

Release date: 10th December 2021

Formats: 12″ Vinyl

A demo EP released as part of Gorillaz: 20th Anniversary Super Deluxe Vinyl Boxset.

Tracklist:

Side A –
1st Idea
Shaga Laga
Genious
Hand Clapper
Acoustic 2
Side B –
Etched image
SINGLES
Clint Eastwood [with Del]

Release Date: 5th March 2001

Formats: Enhanced CD / 12″ Vinyl / Cassette

The first single from Gorillaz.

B-sides:

Clint Eastwood (Ed Case/Sweetie Irie Refix – Edit)
Dracula
Clint Eastwood (Phi Life Cypher Version)
19-2000

Release Date: 25th June 2001

Formats: Enhanced CD / 12″ Vinyl / Cassette

The second single from Gorillaz.

B-sides:

19-2000 (Soulchild Remix)
Left Hand Suzuki Method
19-2000 (The Wiseguys House of Wisdom Re-Mix)
Hip Albatross
Rock the House [with Del]

Release date: 22nd October 2001

Formats: Enhanced CD / 12″ Vinyl / Cassette

The third single from Gorillaz.

B-sides:

The Sounder (Edit) [with Phi Life Cypher]
Faust
Ghost Train
19-2000
911 [+ D12 feat. Terry Hall]

Release date: 7th December 2001

Formats: Digital

A non-album single.

Tomorrow Comes Today

Release Date: 25th February 2002

Formats: DVD / Enhanced CD / 12″ Vinyl

The fourth and final single from Gorillaz.

B-sides:

Film Music
Tomorrow Dub*
Film Music (Mode Remix)

*Later retitled “Bañana Baby” on Laika Come Home.

Starshine [feat. Phi Life Cypher]

Release date: 3rd March 2011

Formats: Digital

This release isn’t classed as a major single; it’s a demo of Starshine that was made available for free via PLC’s SoundCloud & Bandcamp accounts.

911 (Live in NYC) [feat. D12]

Release date: 25th November 2011

Formats: Digital

This release isn’t classed as a major single. It was released exclusively on Spotify for the band’s tenth anniversary. It was performed in 2002 and strangely ends with the audio for the Gorillabite, Jump the Gut.

BOXSETS
Gorillaz: 20th Anniversary Super Deluxe Vinyl Boxset (First Edition)

Release date: 10th December 2021

Formats: 12″ Vinyl

This boxset includes a folder containing 5 sheets of paperwork, 22 sheets of unreleased concept art & 2 mugshots of Damon & Jamie (circa 2001); the first edition was limited to 4000 copies.

Records:

Gorillaz (2021 Remaster)
G Sides (2021 Remaster)
Laika Come Home
Live at the Forum, 2001
Demoz
REMIXES
Lil’ Dub Chefin’ [versus Spacemonkeyz]

Release date: 22nd July 2002

Formats: Enhanced CD / 10″ Vinyl

Released only in the UK, this was the only single from Laika Come Home.

B-sides:

Lil’ Dub Chefin’ (Radio Edit)
Space Monkeyz Theme [Spacemonkeyz]
GUEST APPEARANCES
MTV Music Generator 2

Release date: 25th May 2001

Formats: PlayStation 2 Disc

A song made for an MTV music creation tool; the disc also features the music video for Clint Eastwood.

Track: Dub Dumb

Redman – Smash Sumthin’ [feat. Adam F] / Let’s Get Dirty (I Can’t Get In Da Club) [feat. DJ Kool]

Release date: 3rd September 2001

Formats: Enhanced CD / 12″ Vinyl / Cassette

A remix of Redman feat. DJ Kool – Let’s Get Dirty (I Can’t Get In Da Club) by Gorillaz & Dan the Automator; a B-side on Redman’s double A-side single from the album, Malpractice.

Track: 3. (CD/Cassette [both sides]) / B2. (Vinyl) Let’s Get Dirty (I Can’t Get In Da Club) (Gorillaz Remix) [feat. DJ Kool]

Swallow my Eggnog

Release date: 11th December 2001

Formats: CD

Released only in the US, this was a track made for KROQ’s annual Christmas album.

Track: 21. Don Quixote’s Christmas Bonanza

Blade II: The Soundtrack

Release dates:

UK: 15th March 2002
US: 19th March 2002

Formats: CD / 12″ Vinyl / 12″ Vinyl (Blue Translucent)

A duet with Redman for the soundtrack of the movie, Blade II. Almost every track on the album is a duet. The blue translucent record was released exclusively in the US.

Track: 9. (CD) / C2. (Vinyl) Gorillaz On My Mind [with Redman]

Massive Attack – 100th Window

Release date: 10th February 2003

Formats: CD / 12″ Vinyl / Cassette

A track by Massive Attack; with 2D on backing vocals.

Track: 7. (CD) / D1. (Vinyl) / B2. (Cassette) Small Time Shot Away

Nathan Haines – Squire for Hire

Release date: 8th September 2003

Formats: CD

A cover by Nathan Haines (originally performed by Steely Dan); with 2D on vocals.

Track: 6. FM

The Last Emperor – Science Team…Go!

Release date: 30th October 2009

Formats: CDr

A live performance of Clint Eastwood that features Gorillaz; it was performed in 2002.

Track:

Disc 2 –

6. Clint Eastwood (Live) [feat. Gorillaz]

MIXES
Gorillaz (Gorillaz 20 Mix)

Release date: 9th April 2021

Formats: Digital
